snippet.title: The Mnemograph | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Mnemograph is a strategy game that combines deck-building, card-based combat, deduction, and management, all set in a steampunk world of press and crime. Build a unique deck and manage your printing factory to create the city's most influential newspaper!

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2924080/The_Mnemograph/
Joins us on Discord: https://discord.gg/5vMABpkE
